subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: The All England Club, such a bright place in 2004 for the Russian star at age 17, has gradually become a site with a dark side since that first Grand Slam title.
snippet: The All England Club, such a bright place in 2004 for the Russian star at age 17, has gradually become a site with a dark side since that first Grand Slam title.
